title: data-source
description: This extension creates a new SCO that can be used to represent data sources. Very similar to x-mitre-data-source objects used in ATT&CK.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `data-source`.

name.description: A human readable name for the log source.

category.description: The category value is used to select all log files written by a certain group of products, like firewalls or web server logs.

product.description: The product value is used to select all log outputs of a certain product. For example, all Windows Eventlog types including Security, System, Application and the new log types like AppLocker and Windows Defender.

service.description: Use the service value to select only a subset of a product's logs, like the sshd on Linux or the Security Eventlog on Windows systems.

definition.description: You may also see a definition field within logsource description. This can also provide more information about how to onboard the log data source correctly, and doesn't get included when completing logsource matching.
